Package de.hshl.obj.loader.objects

Class PolygonalSurface

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hshl.obj.meta.Reflective.DataClass
      • de.hshl.obj.loader.objects.PolygonalSurface
  • public class PolygonalSurface
extends Reflective.DataClass
    Contains a geometric mesh and a material. Also supports converting from OBJ data to OpenGL-friendly data.
    Author:
    Johannes Vollmer
